source: mcp-notion (PyPI) + notion-mcp-server (npm) — combined from both implementations
description: Notion workspace management — pages, databases, blocks, comments, and users

tools.name: notion_search
tools.description: Search Notion content by query text

filter_type.description: Optional filter for page or database (leave empty for all)

tools.name: notion_get_page
tools.description: Get details of a specific Notion page

tools.name: notion_create_page
tools.description: Create a new page in a Notion workspace under a specified parent page or database

parent_id.description: ID of the parent page or database

tools.name: notion_update_page
tools.description: Update properties of an existing Notion page

page_id.description: ID of the page to update

properties_json.description: JSON string with properties to update

tools.name: notion_get_block_children
tools.description: Get children blocks of a block or page

block_id.description: The Notion block or page ID

tools.name: notion_append_blocks
tools.description: Append new content blocks to a page or block

block_id.description: The Notion block or page ID to append to

blocks_json.description: JSON string with an array of block objects to append

tools.name: notion_get_database
tools.description: Get details of a specific Notion database

tools.name: notion_query_database
tools.description: Query a Notion database with optional filters and sorting

filter_json.description: Optional JSON string with filter criteria

sorts_json.description: Optional JSON string with sorting criteria
